name: Super heroes Epic Battle
description:
Super easy, Super addictive!
***Simple to play but hard to master***
Super hero Epic battle (Stickman Fight) is one of the most addictive and entertaining basic 2 keys fighting game. In this game, you’ll fight forever.

FEATURES: 
- Easy Control. 
- Innovative endless racing game.  
- Addictive gameplay  
- Amazing Graphics 
 - Fight bosses! Time your hits get your rewards. 
- No need internet  
- Suitable for all types of ages - Endless survival arcade mod game.
- A lots of Amazing Skin you want to custom. 
- Play daily and get great bonuses.
What are you waiting for? Download Super hero Epic battle now!
